CreateKey.document: 创建用户管理数据密钥的主密钥CMK（Custom Master Key），通过CMK后续可以调用其他接口诸如创建数据密钥、加解密等操作。
CreateKey.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: kms.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateKey
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Description": "test描述",
    "Alias": "test8-lzc",
    "KeyUsage": "ENCRYPT_DECRYPT",
    "Type": 1,
    "Tags": [
        {
            "TagKey": "env",
            "TagValue": "dev"
        }
    ]
}
CreateKey.title: 创建主密钥示例

CreateWhiteBoxKey.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: kms.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateWhiteBoxKey
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Alias": "test-lzcw2",
    "Description": "白盒测试",
    "Algorithm": "SM4"
}
CreateWhiteBoxKey.title: 创建白盒密钥

Decrypt.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: kms.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: Decrypt
<公共请求参数>

{
    "CiphertextBlob": "GPJUsGlmPcSjHKIktXGyzn33yestz+7NteW36M6FuL8hPfJ1xVfdO6Akr8sF69x3yBXMwto4njumJMIsi9WKow==-k-XqqalxTyNKIC1rITRePFGQ==-k-GqsANzNxvjjXhKwJAOY85vxYYm/2RtsCXRq7Q1iWbCAoeAtZ",
    "EncryptionContext": "{\"key1\":\"value1\"}",
    "EncryptionAlgorithm": "SM2"
}
Decrypt.title: 解密接口示例

EnableKey.document: 启用一个主密钥，允许该 CMK 被使用。

}
